data.actual_result: The username and the discriminator in the lower left part of the window get highlighted
data.short_description: When maintaining click and dragging to upper part of the window, the username and discriminator get highlighted
data.steps_to_repro: - Left click and maintain at point a few pixels below the dark menu bar (the one with exit, minimize, and maximize on the right, and "Discord" on the left) - Maintain the click while dragging into that dark menu bar
